article_title: Garage fire in Wales damages cars, equipment — Mid-Maine — Bangor Daily News — BDN Maine
article_text:
WALES, Maine — About $30,000 worth of cars and equipment goes up in flames in a garage fire in Wales on Friday morning.

Owner Robert Lowe said he and his son were on their way to the garage to work on a race car.

They heard a “pop,” then saw flames. The garage was destroyed. The cause is under investigation.

article_summary:
WALES, Maine — About $30,000 worth of cars and equipment goes up in flames in a garage fire in Wales on Friday morning.
They heard a “pop,” then saw flames.
Owner Robert Lowe said he and his son were on their way to the garage to work on a race car.
The garage was destroyed.
The cause is under investigation.
